Philippines: 400,000 seafarers fear sailing ban

The fate of hundreds of thousands of Filipino seafarers hangs in the balance as they await a crucial European Commission decision. It follows an audit indicating that the Philippines is in breach of maritime standards.

primary.lead: the Subscriber Identity Module (SIM) Registration Act
primary.title: SIM registration commences Dec. 27
primary.description: Registration of the Subscriber Identity Module (SIM) will commence on Tuesday, Dec. 27, the Department of Information and Communications Technology (DICT) said on Monday. Dec. 26.

secondary.title: Govt, telcos ready for SIM registration
secondary.description: The registration of all Subscriber Identification Module (SIM) cards starts today, December 27.SIM card owners have six months to register. Failure to do so could result in the card's deactivation.

secondary.title: SIM card registration: A step-by-step guide
secondary.description: Manila, Philippines—While over two million SIM cards have been registered in the first two days of the listing that is mandated by law, there are still millions who are unfamiliar with the registration process.

secondary.title: Watch what you consent to: Telcos may use SIM registration data for marketing
secondary.description: Digital advocates advise the public to be mindful of what information they consent to share with telcos while registering their SIM cards
